title: Eggshell incorporated agro-waste adsorbent pellets for sustainable orthophosphate capture from aqueous media

In this study, a ternary granular composite comprised of torrefied wheat straw (TWS), egg shells (ES), and chitosan (Chi) were combined in variable weight ratios. The ternary composites (TWS+ES+Chi) with...
